cause.description:
Selective mutism is a social anxiety disorder, in which a person who is normally capable of speech is unable to speak in given situations. It is usually known as a childrens' disorder but is seen in adults as well (especially if left untreated). The purpose of this cause is not to raise money, but rather to raise awarness and put aside the common misconceptions related to the dissorder. For example, the cause of selective mutism is not caused by trauma and although scientis once believed the condition only affected 0.1 percent of Americans that number has risen to 0.7 and may be much higher due to the lack of understanding of selective mutism. Treatments are crucial for those afflicted with selective mutism and has been proven much more effective for children than adults. If you believe someone you know has selective mutism or you would like to find more information you can vist these websites. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Selective_mutism http://www.selectivemutism.org/ http://www.selectivemutismfoundation.org/ http://www.wellpsych.com/SMInfo.http://www.social-anxiety.com/area-selective-mutism.htmlhtm http://health.groups.yahoo.com/group/Selectivemutismsupportgroup/ http://smaware.co.uk/
1. Selective mutism is a disorder that affects people around the world.
2. Selective mutism must be understood and studied more by the medical community.
3. Early diagnosis is crucial for a more successful treatment.
cause.mission: Spread the awareness of Selective Mutism
cause.name: Selective Mutism Awareness
